snippet: Phil Mickelson, who shot a hard-earned 64, is seeking his first wire-to-wire win since 2006.
abstract: Phil Mickelson takes third-round lead at Phoenix Open golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, who shot a hard-earned 64, is seeking his first wire-to-wire win since 2006.

headline.seo: Phil Mickelson Keeps Lead in Phoenix Open
headline.main: Mickelson Leads but Isn’t Ready to Spike Ball
headline.print_headline: Mickelson Leads but Isn’t Ready to Spike Ball
